generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white directional arrows and lane markings, which is the main surface for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There are pedestrian walkways on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and sometimes planters or railings.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along the street, including residential and commercial structures with windows and storefronts.
- fence: A metal fence is visible along the sidewalk on the right side of the image, separating the pedestrian area from the street.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and sign poles.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, showing green signals.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a triangular warning sign and a circular sign indicating a pedestrian crossing.
- vegetation: There are potted plants and shrubs along the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- person: Several people are visible standing on the sidewalk near the crosswalk.
- car: Several cars are visible parked along the street and driving on the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the left side of the image.
